com.github.sbaudoin.yamllint.rules

Class CommentsIndentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sbaudoin.yamllint.rules.Rule
      • com.github.sbaudoin.yamllint.rules.CommentRule
        • com.github.sbaudoin.yamllint.rules.CommentsIndentation

  • public class CommentsIndentation
extends CommentRule
    Use this rule to force comments to be indented like content.

    Examples:

    With comments-indentation: {} the following code snippet would **PASS**: 

         # Fibonacci
     [0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5]
    the following code snippet would **FAIL**: 
           # Fibonacci
     [0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5]
    the following code snippet would **PASS**: 
         list:
         - 2
         - 3
         # - 4
         - 5
    the following code snippet would **FAIL**: 
         list:
         - 2
         - 3
     #    - 4
         - 5
    the following code snippet would **PASS**: 
         # This is the first object
     obj1:
       - item A
       # - item B
     # This is the second object
     obj2: []
    the following code snippet would **PASS**: 
         # This sentence
     # is a block comment
    the following code snippet would **FAIL**: 
         # This sentence
      # is a block comment

      • check

        public List<LintProblem> check(Map conf,
                               Parser.Comment comment)
        Description copied from class: CommentRule
        Checks the passed comment token and returns a list (possibly empty, but never null)
        Specified by:
        check in class CommentRule
        Parameters:
        conf - the rule configuration
        comment - the comment token to check
        Returns:
        the problems found on this comment. If no problem is found, the list is empty, never null
